argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-fn | |- ( F Fn A <-> ( Fun F /\ dom F = A ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_df-fn | |- ( G Fn B <-> ( Fun G /\ dom G = B ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ineq12 | |- ( ( dom F = A /\ dom G = B ) -> ( dom F i^i dom G ) = ( A i^i B ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( ( dom F = A /\ dom G = B ) -> ( ( dom F i^i dom G ) = (/) <-> ( A i^i B ) = (/) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_anbi2d | |- ( ( dom F = A /\ dom G = B ) -> ( ( ( Fun F /\ Fun G ) /\ ( dom F i^i dom G ) = (/) ) <-> ( ( Fun F /\ Fun G ) /\ ( A i^i B ) = (/) ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_funun | |- ( ( ( Fun F /\ Fun G ) /\ ( dom F i^i dom G ) = (/) ) -> Fun ( F u. G ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl6bir | |- ( ( dom F = A /\ dom G = B ) -> ( ( ( Fun F /\ Fun G ) /\ ( A i^i B ) = (/) ) -> Fun ( F u. G ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_dmun | |- dom ( F u. G ) = ( dom F u. dom G ) |
| 9 |  | #P_uneq12 | |- ( ( dom F = A /\ dom G = B ) -> ( dom F u. dom G ) = ( A u. B ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ( dom F = A /\ dom G = B ) -> dom ( F u. G ) = ( A u. B ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_jctird | |- ( ( dom F = A /\ dom G = B ) -> ( ( ( Fun F /\ Fun G ) /\ ( A i^i B ) = (/) ) -> ( Fun ( F u. G ) /\ dom ( F u. G ) = ( A u. B ) ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_df-fn | |- ( ( F u. G ) Fn ( A u. B ) <-> ( Fun ( F u. G ) /\ dom ( F u. G ) = ( A u. B ) ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl6ibr | |- ( ( dom F = A /\ dom G = B ) -> ( ( ( Fun F /\ Fun G ) /\ ( A i^i B ) = (/) ) -> ( F u. G ) Fn ( A u. B ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_expd | |- ( ( dom F = A /\ dom G = B ) -> ( ( Fun F /\ Fun G ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) = (/) -> ( F u. G ) Fn ( A u. B ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_impcom | |- ( ( ( Fun F /\ Fun G ) /\ ( dom F = A /\ dom G = B ) ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) = (/) -> ( F u. G ) Fn ( A u. B ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_an4s | |- ( ( ( Fun F /\ dom F = A ) /\ ( Fun G /\ dom G = B ) ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) = (/) -> ( F u. G ) Fn ( A u. B ) ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 2, 16 | #P_syl2anb | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ G Fn B ) -> ( ( A i^i B ) = (/) -> ( F u. G ) Fn ( A u. B ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_imp | |- ( ( ( F Fn A /\ G Fn B ) /\ ( A i^i B ) = (/) ) -> ( F u. G ) Fn ( A u. B ) ) |
